cleaned_text: What is Lashile Beauty good Immunity 60 gummies used for? Lashile Beauty Good Immunity are gummies, which have been formulated to boost the immune system and stimulate the body's natural defenses, they are rich in vitamins. These gummies are suitable for vegans, they are not tested on animals, they are made in France, they are made with a delicious fruit aroma. These gummies have been designed with an alliance of active essential nutrients that will help support and stimulate the immune system , activate the body defenses , and helps reduce fatigue . Unlike conventional food supplements, Lashile Beauty good Immunity 60 gummies are easy to take and assimilate thanks to their shape and their fruity scent you will not have the feeling of taking a food supplement, but rather enjoying a little candy. These gummies are made without gelatin, lactose and gluten. How to properly use Lashile Beauty good Immunity 60 gummies? Take 2 gummies a day when and where you want. 30 day program (1 month bottle). There are 60 gummies per bottle. Comment on the advice of use and dosage of Lashile Beauty Good Immunity 60 gummies with our partner reviewsfrom verified after your purchase. What is the composition of these Gummies? Lashile Beauty good Immunity 60 gummies is formulated with: Wheat syrup - Sugar - Fructooligosaccharides of fruit of acerola (Malpighia punicifolia L.) - Dry extract of grapefruit fruit (Citrus paradisi Macfad.) - L-Glutamine - Lactobacillus rhamnosus - Zinc citrate - Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) - Natural orange flavor - Concentrated black carrot juice - Acidifying agent: Potassium citrate - Antioxidant: extract rich in tocopherols, coating agent: carnauba wax - Cholecalciferol (Vitamin D) from Cladonia rangiferina - Cyanocobalamin (Vitamin B12) - Pteroylmonoglutamic acid (Vitamin B9). What are the side effects and contraindications? Internal use. Respect the dosage. Store in a clean, dry place away from heat, humidity and light. Always keep out of the reach of children.
